brand_identity.name: BuildConnect
brand_identity.theme_strategy: Light Mode Primary (Hygiene/Openness) with Dark Mode Support

headings.usage: Use for all section headers, hero titles, and modal titles. Tight tracking (-0.02em).

body.usage: Use for all paragraph text, inputs, and data tables. Normal tracking.

mono.usage: Use for order IDs, transaction codes, and technical data.

primary.name: Royal Trust Blue
primary.usage: Primary buttons, active states, key brand elements.

spacing_system.rules: Always use double the standard spacing for marketing sections to create 'breathing room'.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-11 px-8 rounded-md font-medium transition-all shadow-sm hover:shadow-md
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 h-11 px-8 rounded-md font-medium
buttons.outline: border-2 border-input bg-background hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground h-11 px-8 rounded-md font-medium

cards.service_card: bg-card text-card-foreground rounded-xl border border-border/50 shadow-sm hover:shadow-lg hover:-translate-y-1 transition-all duration-300 overflow-hidden
cards.dashboard_widget: bg-card text-card-foreground rounded-lg border border-border shadow-none p-6

inputs.default: h-11 rounded-md border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

marketing_hero.description: Asymmetrical grid. Hero text spans 8 cols, image spans 4 cols (or vice versa). Use negative space.

dashboard_grid.description: Dense grid. Widgets fill 100% height. No jagged bottoms.

booking_flow.description: Single column, focused task. Progress bar at top. Sticky summary on mobile.

visual_enhancers.gradients: Use subtle mesh gradients for hero backgrounds only. No text gradients.
visual_enhancers.shadows: shadow-[0_8px_30px_rgb(0,0,0,0.04)] for cards. shadow-[0_8px_30px_rgb(0,0,0,0.12)] for floating elements.

universal_guidelines: Do not use 'Inter' for Headings. Use 'Manrope'.
Do not use generic teal (#1B93A4). Use the specified 'Clean Teal' (#0D9488).
Marketing pages must use custom HTML/Tailwind layouts, not rigid Shadcn cards.
Dashboards must use Shadcn components for consistency.
Mobile images must not exceed 80vh height.
instructions_to_main_agent: Follow the 'Swiss & High-Contrast' archetype. Prioritize white space and clear typography. Use the provided image URLs for the respective sections. Implement the 'Intent-First' booking flow pattern.
